page.title: 18Bexhill business interview
page.content: {How has your business developed? I sat in Bexhill and waited for the phone to ring. Now I've 1000 clients. {How do your products change?} They don't, they just get more expensive. {How has demand changed?}It never really changes, it varies slightly wih people's circumstances. {How many people do you employ?}I have 3 employees,1 associate and 1 partner. {What are your working hours per week? About 70 hours, including overtime. {Are your records computerised? }No. {Does your business involve travelling? Yes, to Lewes and Brighton. {Are you satisfied with the postal {service?}No, because it is unreliable. {Are you in favour of Sunday trading? No, because it is not necessary
